meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Jeezly! I can't believe I forgot my lunch again!
meanings.sent2: Oh jeezly, I didn't expect that to happen.
meanings.sent3: Jeezly, that was a close call with the spilled milk!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me jump, jeezly!
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick left the audience jeezly amazed.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is characteristic of someone named Jeezly.
meanings.sent1: She walked jeezly into the room, with a big smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: He sang jeezly, hitting every note perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred jeezly as it curled up on the cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The car sped jeezly down the highway, leaving a trail of dust behind.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed jeezly in the warm sunlight.
